events.message: We received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering department focused on software development roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out soon to coordinate next steps including scheduling interviews.
We conducted an initial screening call where we discussed your experience in software engineering and matched skills.
You confirmed your availability for the next steps and expressed enthusiasm about working with our engineering team.
Your technical interview with our senior developer has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC via video conference.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating a strong understanding of coding principles and problem-solving.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and logistics on April 22nd at 3 PM UTC.
During the HR interview, you conveyed alignment with company values and asked insightful questions about growth opportunities.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role including competitive salary and benefits package.
